title: The Vaccine Divide and Emerging Segregation Society
cleaned_text:
Former President Donald Trump also got in on the act, declaring critics of the vaccine as peddlers of “deranged-pseudo science” while questioning the need to pause the J&J shot to investigate blood clotting issues, tweeting:

At some point shaming, shunning, and treating the unvaccinated like social pariahs will not be enough for the COVIDiots pushing the collectivist mindset that everyone has to be vaccinated in order for anyone to have protection.

Now these mind-controlled minions are branding anyone questioning the safety of vaccines or opposing vaccine mandates as an anti-vaxxer, and equating anti-vaxxers to terrorists. These tactics are akin to branding someone a conspiracy theorist the second they express skepticism over some narrative the government wants you to believe. It’s why Big Tech has turned into Big Brother in its attempts to censor any information that contradicts official sources, and brand anyone questioning the narrative on COVID-19 and the experimental injections as anti-science rumor spreaders.

Dr. Peter Hotez, a well-respected vaccinologist, equates vaccine disinformation with the same level of threat as terrorism, cyber attacks, and nuclear armament. He wants to stamp it out by forming a global task force that reports to the United Nations, stating:

The fact is that the majority of people questioning the safety and necessity of COVID “vaccines” are neither anti-science nor anti-vaxxers. These are just convenient labels to dismiss anyone actually paying attention to real science as conspiracy theorists. But this is what happens when you draw conclusions that don’t fit the current mass vaccination agenda.

The Biometric Security Surveillance State is the True End Game

The people advocating for lockdowns, masking, vaccinated-only access, shunning, and other policies to destroy individual liberty and bodily autonomy are using this “health crisis” as an excuse to usher in a biometric security surveillance state. While the country is growing more fractured over a plethora of issues, with family members at odds over vaccination status, the Biden administration has quietly introduced a proposal to create a new health-focused federal agency modeled after DARPA to “leverage existing federal research assets with advancements in biotechnology, supercomputing, big data, and artificial intelligence to cure disease.”

DARPA is the federal military agency responsible for creating The Internet, Voice Recognition Technology, GPS navigation, Night vision, Brain-Interfacing Machines, Siri, Robot Dogs, and much more. Many of these inventions have benefited humanity once they were adopted for widespread usage, but the technologies have also enabled mass spying, big data collection, censorship, and secret surveillance.

HARPA, the newly proposed agency first introduced during the Trump administration, wants to create a project called “Safe Home” (Stopping Aberrant Fatal Events by Helping Overcome Mental Extremes) to use volunteer data to identify “neurobehavioral signs” of “someone headed toward a violent explosive act.” If approved, this agency will usher in the age of medical precrime where innocent individuals may be presumed to be mentally ill or contagious disease carriers unless one submits to forthcoming precision medicine and gene-altering therapies that bypass traditional medicine.

If the “vaccines” work as all the propaganda states, only those refusing the shots are taking a risk. It’s actually a pretty safe risk considering that the U.S. survival rate is over 98% for those who contract COVID-19, a virus with symptoms pretty similar to influenza that also kills thousands every year (except for 2020 where it mysteriously disappeared). So why is there such a coordinated, urgent global agenda to get people to submit to taking “experimental” injections that so far have not been fully approved by any government or health agency?

The lengths that the U.S. and other countries are going to in an effort to coerce and bribe their populations into taking any version of these “Experimental Use Authorization vaccines” should set off alarm bells in any thinking person. The attempts at coercion also defy The Nuremberg Code rules on informed consent, which state:

The voluntary consent of the human subject is absolutely essential. This means that the person involved should have legal capacity to give consent; should be so situated as to be able to exercise free power of choice, without the intervention ofany element of force, fraud, deceit, duress, overreaching, or other ulterior form of constraint or coercion; and should have sufficient knowledge and comprehension of the elements of the subject matter involved as to enable him to make an understanding and enlightened decision.This latter element requires that before the acceptance of an affirmative decision by the experimental subject there should be made known to him the nature, duration, and purpose of the experiment; the method and means by which it is to be conducted; all inconveniences and hazards reasonably to be expected; and the effects upon his health or person which may possibly come from his participation in the experiment.

They also violate Article 6 of UNESCO’s Universal Declaration on Bioethics and Human Rights, which declare:
• Any preventive, diagnostic and therapeutic medical intervention is only to be carried out with the prior, free and informed consent of the person concerned, based on adequate information. The consent should, where appropriate, be express and may be withdrawn by the person concerned at any time and for any reason without disadvantage or prejudice.
• Scientific research should only be carried out with the prior, free, express and informed consent of the person concerned. The information should be adequate, provided in a comprehensible form and should include modalities for withdrawal of consent. Consent may be withdrawn by the person concerned at any time and for any reason without any disadvantage or prejudice. Exceptions to this principle should be made only in accordance with ethical and legal standards adopted by States, consistent with the principles and provisions set out in this Declaration, in particular in Article 27, and international human rights law.

Many people who blindly trust authorities, experts, the media, entertainers, or anyone who boldly asserts how safe these experimental technologies are without acknowledging the potential for serious harm are in for a rude awakening. Do you really think the people who allowed National Guard troops to give them COVID shots on the spot at 7-Eleven and local bars were provided with all the facts before consenting to being injected? How about those at pop-up vaccine sites or drive-thrus?

Even if one does not experience adverse effects or only has mild symptoms after being injected, there is no data available whatsoever that can predict what the long-term effects from these experimental gene-therapies masquerading as vaccines will be. All of those who have rolled up their sleeves voluntarily, under coercion, or via threat are serving as test subjects. May God help them and all of us.
